ygData.subject: RE: Bards and cha
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The three masks I wore before I got my Guise of the Deceiver were 1) Snakeskin - which I wore until level 20 or so 2) Leering Mask - Dex boost (3 or 5 I
ygData.messageBody:
>The Guise you have to get from
>a dungeon yourself, while the veil can be made by a talented jeweler.
>
>Any other face suggestions folks?

The three masks I wore before I got my Guise of the Deceiver were

1) Snakeskin - which I wore until level 20 or so
2) Leering Mask - Dex boost (3 or 5 I don't remember) instead of poison
resist boost which I wore until level 30 or so.
3) Dented Brass Mask - 3 strength boost which I wore until I got the Guise.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 39 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
